name: Save Ganimede
description:
A dystopian future, a raging war and the ultimate airship.
But not everything goes always as planned.
You are our only hope.

Discover this engaging 2D game where you will find yourself in a stressful situation where it may be difficult to keep yourself alive.
Refill your fuel, collect nitro-booster and battle the enemy troops to keep GANIMEDE alive.

  • Controls:
    SPACE or UP or W to boost.
    DOWN or S to drop anti submarine bombs.
    ESC to switch fullscreen mode.

Game available in installer and compressed file mode.

Thanks for playing.
